comments:
Import the log attached then use the attached symptom catalog to analyze all records.
In the analysis result view open the Filter properties dialog, deselect all, then select only 'Symptom definition' attribute; click finish

I get an error dialog and this exception at the console; I keep getting this exception even if I go back and reset the filter attributes to what I had before. I am also confused by the stack trace; I did run a correlation although the exception comes from a correlator class

avax.xml.transform.TransformerException: Expected ], but found: AND
	at org.apache.xpath.compiler.XPathParser.error(Unknown Source)

Fixed. You were getting the error because the catalog contained an erroneous XPath rule. The engines are all named  correlation engines in 4.2 and are capable of doing different types of operations, like analysis, correlation, filtering etc., that the implementer can specify.
